analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x24282fb9cabb921dfa300666a30d972e9c2fe5a8.sol:

Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x24282fb9cabb921dfa300666a30d972e9c2fe5a8.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
